test_cases.name: test_search_videos_basic
test_cases.description: Test basic video search with query only

test_cases.name: test_search_videos_with_page_token
test_cases.description: Test video search with page token for pagination

test_cases.name: test_search_videos_empty_query
test_cases.description: Test video search with empty query (should fail)

test_cases.name: test_search_videos_whitespace_query
test_cases.description: Test video search with whitespace-only query (should fail)

test_cases.name: test_get_videos_single_id_default_parts
test_cases.description: Test getting single video with default parts (snippet)

test_cases.name: test_get_videos_multiple_ids_multiple_parts
test_cases.description: Test getting multiple videos with multiple parts

test_cases.name: test_get_videos_empty_ids
test_cases.description: Test getting videos with empty ID list (should fail)

test_cases.name: test_get_videos_invalid_parts
test_cases.description: Test getting videos with invalid parts (should fail)

test_cases.name: test_get_videos_too_many_ids
test_cases.description: Test getting videos with too many IDs (should fail - max 50)

test_cases.name: test_get_videos_all_parts
test_cases.description: Test getting video with multiple valid parts

test_cases.name: test_get_transcript_valid_id
test_cases.description: Test getting transcript for valid video ID

test_cases.name: test_get_transcript_with_language
test_cases.description: Test getting transcript with specific language preference

test_cases.name: test_get_transcript_empty_id
test_cases.description: Test getting transcript with empty video ID (should fail)

test_cases.name: test_get_transcript_whitespace_id
test_cases.description: Test getting transcript with whitespace-only video ID (should fail)

test_cases.name: test_search_videos_specific_topic
test_cases.description: Test video search for specific programming topic

test_cases.name: test_get_videos_content_details_only
test_cases.description: Test getting video with only contentDetails part
